thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Patricia Sewell

author: Patricia Sewell
title: Patricia Sewell
text: With numerous pets, some with issues such as food allergies, severe car sickness, deaf, blind, etc... boarding them is an impossibility. Before joining TrustedHousesitters, I employed numerous pet sitters with varying but always terrible results (including the death of a dog). I've used TrustedHousitters 3 times so far and every experience has been positive. I recommend them to everyone I talk to with pets. I can't say enough good things about this company and the system it has in place. I will never go anywhere else to find care for my pets. I look forward to a long friendship with our most recent house sitter who lives on another continent and whom I never would have met if not for this incredible company.
